text: Sokode kare wa hakobune o tsukuri hajimeta. Kare no min no shuchō-tachi wa, sono-gawa o sugiru tabi ni kare o chōshō shita. Kare wa itta. `Tatoe anata gataga (ima) watashi-tachi o chōshō shite mo, izure anata gataga chōshō suru yō ni, kitto watashi-tachi ga anata gata o chōshō suru yō ni naru
